# Background Music for Strong Lines

Place your background music files here (MP3 format).

Recommended: 2-5 minute loops
Format: MP3 or OGG Vorbis

License-free music sources:
- Free Music Archive (freemusicarchive.org)
- ccMixter (ccmixter.org)
- Incompetech (incompetech.com) - Kevin MacLeod
- Purple Planet Music (purple-planet.com)

The game will let you select music tracks or use random selection per level.

Make sure to verify the license allows use in games!
